javascript.title: Prototype Pollution
javascript.description: Versions of lodash prior to 4.17.19 are vulnerable to Prototype Pollution. The vulnerable functions allow properties and methods to be added to the global Object.prototype.

javascript.title: Server-Side Request Forgery
javascript.description: Versions of axios prior to 0.21.1 allow attackers to cause Server Side Request Forgery by providing a URL with an arbitrary protocol.

javascript.title: Prototype Pollution
javascript.description: Affected versions of minimist are vulnerable to prototype pollution. Arguments are not properly sanitized, allowing an attacker to modify the prototype of Object.

javascript.title: Denial of Service
javascript.description: Versions of node-fetch prior to 2.6.1 are vulnerable to denial of service. The keepalive option is not properly checked.

javascript.title: Cross-site Scripting
javascript.description: Versions of jquery prior to 3.5.0 are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting due to incorrect html parsing.

javascript.title: Prototype Pollution
javascript.description: Versions of y18n prior to 4.0.1 and 5.0.5 are vulnerable to prototype pollution.

javascript.title: Regular Expression Denial of Service
javascript.description: Versions of socket.io prior to 2.4.0 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service in the object parameter.

javascript.title: Signature Malleability
javascript.description: Versions of elliptic prior to 6.5.4 are vulnerable to Signature Malleability by tampering the pre-computed signature pair.

javascript.title: Regular Expression Denial of Service
javascript.description: Versions of glob-parent prior to 5.1.2 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service when handling unusual filepath strings.

javascript.title: Denial of Service
javascript.description: Versions of ws prior to 7.4.6 are vulnerable to denial of service by excessive memory usage.

python.title: SQL Injection
python.description: Django before 2.2.24 and 3.2.5 has an SQL injection vulnerability in the QuerySet.order_by() function.

python.title: XSS Vulnerability
python.description: Flask before 2.0.1 has a cross-site scripting vulnerability in the default 404 and 500 HTML pages.

python.title: Code Execution Vulnerability
python.description: PyYAML before 5.4 has a code execution vulnerability when loading untrusted YAML files.

python.title: Information Disclosure
python.description: Requests before 2.20.0 has an information disclosure vulnerability with CRLF sequences.

python.title: Multiple Vulnerabilities
python.description: Pillow before 8.3.2 has multiple security vulnerabilities including memory leaks and potential arbitrary code execution.

python.title: Information Leak
python.description: Cryptography before 3.3.2 has an information leak vulnerability during prime number validation.

python.title: Regular Expression Denial of Service
python.description: Jinja2 before 2.11.3 could be vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service in the urlize filter.

python.title: CRLF Injection
python.description: Urllib3 before 1.26.5 has a CRLF injection vulnerability in the HTTP client when using url parameters.

python.title: SQL Injection
python.description: SQLAlchemy before 1.4.0 has a potential SQL injection vulnerability in certain circumstances.

python.title: Path Traversal
python.description: Werkzeug before 2.0.0 has a path traversal vulnerability in the secure_filename function.

java.title: Log4Shell
java.description: Apache Log4j2 <=2.14.1 JNDI features used in configuration, log messages, and parameters do not protect against attacker controlled LDAP and other JNDI related endpoints.

java.title: Multiple Deserialization Vulnerabilities
java.description: Multiple deserialization vulnerabilities in Jackson-databind before 2.12.0 could lead to remote code execution.

ruby.title: Multiple Vulnerabilities
ruby.description: Rails before 6.1.4 has multiple vulnerabilities including potential DoS and XSS attacks.

ruby.title: Command Injection
ruby.description: Nokogiri before 1.11.4 has a command injection vulnerability in the XSLT transform function.
